description: This file defines the MdnsUtils class responsible for mDNS service registration, browsing, and resolution using Apple's DNS Service Discovery API. It manages service advertisements, discovery of services on the local network, and resolves service addresses, with threading support for asynchronous browsing.

classes.name: MdnsUtils
classes.description: A utility class for managing mDNS services including registration, browsing, and resolution, with threading support.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::MdnsUtils
methods.description: Constructor initializing internal states and resources.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::~MdnsUtils
methods.description: Destructor cleaning up resources, stopping threads, and deallocating services.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::stopBrowser
methods.description: Stops the ongoing browsing thread and cleans up related resources.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::registerService
methods.description: Registers an mDNS service with given name, type, port, and optional interface.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::registerBrowser
methods.description: Starts browsing for services of a specified type with a given listener and interface.

methods.name: MdnsUtils::browseThread
methods.description: Thread function that performs mDNS browsing and handles discovery events.

methods.name: void DNSSD_API browseCallback(DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * serviceName,const char * regtype,const char * replyDomain,void * context)
void browseThread(const std::string & type,const int interfaceIndex)

void MdnsUtils::DNSSD_API getAddrInfoCallback(DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * hostname,const struct sockaddr * address,uint32_t ttl,void * context)
bool registerBrowser(const std::string & type,IMdnsBrowserListener * listener,const std::string & ifName)
bool registerService(const std::string & name,const std::string & type,uint16_t port,const std::string & ifName)

void MdnsUtils::DNSSD_API resolveCallback(DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * fullname,const char * hosttarget,uint16_t port,uint16_t txtLen,const unsigned char * txtRecord,void * context)

ctags.signature: (DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * serviceName,const char * regtype,const char * replyDomain,void * context)

ctags.pattern: /^void MdnsUtils::browseThread(const std::string& type, const int interfaceIndex)$/

ctags.signature: (DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * hostname,const struct sockaddr * address,uint32_t ttl,void * context)

ctags.pattern: /^bool MdnsUtils::registerBrowser(const std::string& type, IMdnsBrowserListener* listener, const s/

ctags.pattern: /^bool MdnsUtils::registerService(const std::string& name, const std::string& type, uint16_t port,/
ctags.signature: (const std::string & name,const std::string & type,uint16_t port,const std::string & ifName)

ctags.signature: (DNSServiceRef sdRef,DNSServiceFlags flags,uint32_t interfaceIndex,DNSServiceErrorType errorCode,const char * fullname,const char * hosttarget,uint16_t port,uint16_t txtLen,const unsigned char * txtRecord,void * context)
